name: GetUserDetails
description:
Retrieve detailed user information from Asana.

Use this tool to get the complete user record for a specific user in Asana by providing their user ID. Ensure you have the required scope: users:read.

parameters.name: user_identifier
parameters.description: A string to identify a user, which can be 'me', an email, or a user's gid.

value_schema.description: A string identifying a user. This can either be the string "me", an email, or the gid of a user.
